title: Quran
description: In their hearts is disease, so Allah has increased their disease; and for them is a painful punishment because they [habitually] used to lie.

title: Hadith
description: I heard the Messenger of Allah, sallallahu 'alayhi wasallam, say: Avoid that which I forbid you to do and do that which I command you to do to the best of your capacity. Verily the people before you were destroyed only because of their excessive questioning and their disagreement with their Prophets.
